name: Summer Special!
description:
Our Summer Special consists of any two (2) of our 5 oz. body products and an unscented soy body bar for $20.00 ($25.00 if you would like a scented soap instead).

Please view our fragrance page and indicate which scent you would like for your products through the "Add special instructions for merchant" link of the PayPal checkout page.

name: Body & Bath Products
description:
5  or 10 oz. sizes available

Our Soy Secrets body and bath products includes body wash, body lotion, fragrance mist and Body Bar.

Please select which product you would like to order from the drop down below.

View our fragrances page and indicate which scent you would like for your products through the "Add special instructions for merchant" link of the PayPal checkout page.

--------------------
Ingredients:

Lotion - Aloe vera, shea butter & extracts, grapefruit & rice, jojoba oil, vitamin E, rice bran oil, soybean protein and soybean oil.  This product is alcohol free.

Body Wash - Extract of grapefruit, rice & rosemary, soybean protein and aloe vera gel.  This product is alcohol free.

Fragrance Mist - Honey, sunflower, lavender & soybean extract oil. 17 types of free amino acids, soybean protein & denatured alcohol (natural).

4 oz

Our Soy Secrets body bar is good for evening out skin tone.  We also offer a specialty bar with a combination of goats milk, soy, olive oil and shea butter.

Please view our fragrances and indicate which scent you would like for your products through the "Add special instructions for merchant" link of the PayPal checkout page.

name: Body Bar
description:
4 oz

Our Soy Secrets body bar is good for evening out skin tone.  We also offer a specialty bar with a combination of goats milk, soy, olive oil and shea butter.

Please view our fragrances page and indicate which scent you would like for your products through the "Add special instructions for merchant" link of the PayPal checkout page.

----------------
Ingredients:

Purified Water, Glycerin, Sodium Stearate, 100% Soy Bean Oil, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Laureth Sulphate (SLES), Stearic Acid, Lauric Acid, Sodium Chloride.

name: Body Scrubs, Butters and Glazes
description:
4 oz. & 8 oz.

Our Sugar and Salt Body Scrubs are made of natural agents and the sea salts have an antibacterial agent in them.  They are also made to remove dead skin cells from your body revealing the new skin underneath.

Body Glaze with Goat's Milk -
This product feels good on the skin!  Loaded with great things like soy, goats milk, olive oil, sweet almond oil, aloe vera extract and vitamin E, it is neither like a hand or body lotion.  It has the appearance of a thick cream but goes on like a smooth glaze and is refreshing to the skin!

The Soy Body Butter - 
This product is a very smooth moisturizer that will last you all day. It is also a great product if you have problem dry areas.  It contains shea butter, soybean, fragrance oil and  Vitamin E.

Please select the product that you would like to order from the drop down below.

Please view our fragrances page and indicate which scent you would like for your products through the "Add special instructions for merchant" link of the PayPal checkout page.

-----------------
Ingredients:

Our body scrubs are made with either sea salts or sugar and various natural plant and fragrance oils.
